items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Base Tape is a single-sided dull tape made for use between the unit and another two-sided tape.">
items.storedetaileddescription: Walker Tape®’s Base Tape is a multi-purpose system care product that is made to both mend and make repairs in hair systems; and allow for stronger adhesives to be used on more fragile/gentle unit bases. It's a single-sided, dull, and semi-flexible adhesive that helps client's get a longer life out of their hair system.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Storage

 

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Seal bags completely. With proper storage, our tapes have a shelf life of up to one year.
items.storedescription:
To Repair Damages

  1. Cut a small piece of Base Tape from the roll.
  2. Place the tape on the inside of the hair system, over the damaged area. Make sure that the system is clean and dry before doing so.
  3. Complete the rest of the installation as normal.

 

To Prepare Delicate Systems for Stronger Adhesives

  1. Cut however many pieces you need for install from the roll of Base Tape.
  2. Place the Base Tape along the inside of the system, wherever you intend to apply another two-sided tape. Make sure the system is clean and dry before doing so.
  3. Base Tape makes it possible to use a stronger tape on a delicate system, such as Ultra Hold Tape on a lace-based unit.
